name: Antidote.github.io
body:
### About Me
Hello, I'm Phillip Stephens, though you may know me as Antidote from places like metroidconstruction.com, the-gcn.com, gbatemp.net, and emutalk.net. I'm a rather big Nintendo nut and enjoy cracking their formats, the code you see on my github is largely a result of that.

##Links
[Athena](/Athena)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
